thudemsata thurki karmanthaye wadagath sthanayak atha 08 / 10 / 2012 tedemsa hi samanyadhikari thanathure sita prawahana, samudra katayuthu ha sanniwedana amathyanshaye upadeshaka lesa path karana lada selim darsan, tudamsa hi samanyadhikari saha sabhapathi lesa siya rajakariya 10 / 05 / 2011 hi aarambha kaleya. / 02 dinaya saha 10 / 2012 prawahana, samudra katayuthu ha sanniwedana amathyanshaye thiranaya samanga amathyanshaye niyogaya lesa path kara atha. 28429 warshika ithihasaya saha thurki karmanthaye wadagath sthanayak himi wana athara, mema wishishta sanwidhanaye wada kirimata labima gana mama itha sathutu wemi.

testosteron homonaya purushayinge lingika awayawa hadanda, purusha gathilakshana pawathwagena yanda wagema lingika aashawa athi karandath dayaka wenawa.eeka hinda eka eka awashyathawaladi samaharunge wrushana iwath karanawa.samaharu adhika lingika aashawa hinda sthri dushakayek unoth danduwamak widihata wrushanawala kriyakarithwaya nathi karanda dakunu koriyawa wage samahara ratawal kriya karanawa.ee wagema harak, ballo wage saththunge prajanana hakiyawa nathi karandath me widihata wrushana winasha karala danawa.ee dawaswala harakwa wanda karana me kriyawata kiwwe 'kara ambaanawa' kiyala.eeka kale polu dekak aragena harakage wrushana deka me polu deka maddata thiyala ambaarana ekalu.hithanakotath yatibada kora wela yanawa.
